apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your API key is only used to query Z.AI servers and is not stored.
apiKey.invalid: Format: 32 hex characters + dot + 16 alphanumeric characters

empty.title: Enter your API key
empty.description: Enter your API key and click "Fetch" to view your usage statistics.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: Welcome to the Z.AI Coding Plan Dashboard. This dashboard helps you track your API usage and quota limits.
gettingStarted.prerequisitesDesc: You'll need a Z.AI API key to use this dashboard.
gettingStarted.step1Desc: Obtain your API key from the Z.AI platform.
gettingStarted.step2Desc: Paste your API key in the input field and click Fetch.
gettingStarted.step3Desc: Your usage statistics will be displayed in real-time.

apiReference.title: API Reference
apiReference.overview: The dashboard uses the Z.AI Usage API to fetch statistics.
apiReference.endpointDesc: Fetch usage data for a given time range.
apiReference.paramStartTimeDesc: Start time in format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss
apiReference.paramEndTimeDesc: End time in format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: No, your API key is only stored in your browser's localStorage and is never sent to any server except Z.AI's official API.
faq.q2: How often is the data updated?
faq.a2: Data is fetched in real-time when you click the Fetch button. You can refresh at any time.
faq.a3: By default, the dashboard shows usage data for the last 24 hours, grouped by hour.
